revised_title: Ferroelectric Bismuth Oxides: Electron Microscopy and Structural Analysis
tldr: The authors studied ferroelectric bismuth oxides containing perovskite layers using high-resolution electron microscopy. They observed dark bands corresponding to the layers and lines between them due to the perovskite A cations. The lattice images revealed dislocations and domain boundaries in the crystals for the first time. The study provides insights into the microstructure and properties of these materials.
